https://www.coursera.org.title: Coursera Main Landing Page
https://www.coursera.org.info: Landing page content including page structure, navigation, hero sections, value propositions, pricing strategy, and CTA placement. Key messaging focuses on career advancement with individual, business, university, and government segments.

https://www.udemy.com.title: Udemy Main Landing Page
https://www.udemy.com.info: Landing page structure with focus on individual courses vs subscription plans (Personal, Team, Enterprise), pricing strategies with discounts, and platform differentiation through partnerships and course variety.

https://www.khanacademy.org.title: Khan Academy Main Landing Page
https://www.khanacademy.org.info: Mission-driven non-profit positioning with free educational content, AI-powered Khanmigo tools, and donation-based funding model. Clear segmentation for learners, teachers, and districts.

https://www.instructure.com/canvas.title: Canvas LMS Landing Page
https://www.instructure.com/canvas.info: B2B-focused positioning as '#1 LMS in North America' with strong institutional messaging for K-12, higher education, and business/government sectors. Emphasis on scalability and integrations.

https://moodle.com.title: Moodle Main Landing Page
https://moodle.com.info: Open-source platform emphasizing data control, privacy, and customization as key differentiators from commercial competitors. Strong focus on global partner network and institutional adoption.

https://www.masterclass.com.title: MasterClass Main Landing Page
https://www.masterclass.com.info: Premium positioning with celebrity instructors and subscription model. Content focused on creative and professional skills with emphasis on entertainment value and brand appeal.

https://www.linkedin.com/learning/.title: LinkedIn Learning Landing Page
https://www.linkedin.com/learning/.info: Professional development platform integrated with LinkedIn ecosystem, targeting working professionals. Emphasis on career advancement, role-based learning paths, and enterprise adoption.

https://www.edx.org.title: edX Main Landing Page
https://www.edx.org.info: Partnership-driven model with prestigious universities (Harvard, MIT, etc.) offering academic credentials from courses to full degrees. Strong emphasis on institutional credibility.

https://teachable.com.title: Teachable Main Landing Page
https://teachable.com.info: Creator-focused platform for building educational businesses, not just consuming content. Strong emphasis on monetization tools, course creation capabilities, and global tax handling.
